title: Add default deck utils and manual save retry
message: Centralize default deck data into src/utils/deckData.js (exports DECK_NAMES and DEFAULT_DECKS) and update MainPage and MainPageSignin to import from the new module. Add repairEmptyDecks in MainPageSignin to detect small/empty Drive files and restore them from defaults before creating missing decks. Request file size in googleDriveService.listFiles (fields: 'files(id, name, size)') to support the repair check. Add a manual save handler and a "Retry Save" button in GameSummary to allow users to retry saving progress to Drive when an automatic save fails.
